summary: When a photo model gets replaced by a batch of new younger prettier girls, her life of riches melts in front of her eyes and she's forced to live like a homeless person in a parking lot of a high class hotel she once lived in.
cast: Agata Buzek|Devid Striesow|Birol Ünel|Anne Sarah Hartung|Ricarda Meßner|Yevgeni Sitokhin|Guntbert Warns|Sabine Vitua|Miriam Sachs|Pheline Roggan|Franz Dinda|Bettina Kurth|Romina Meier|Stephan Schneider|Henriette Gonnermann|Jasmin Dickerson|Bernhard Moosbauer|Frédéric Vonhof|Uwe Fischer|Wolfram Emter|Thomas Müller|Martin Meier|Irina Iwas|Michael Krause|Nadine Tröber|Christian Volkmann|Ali Örüm|Jana Radau|Heinrich Rolfing|Michael Gitter|Martin Ecker|Andreas Pilarczyk|Günter Huttarsch|Luka Hinze|Sylvie Lazzarini|Anna von Rüden|Astrid Zöfel|Renate Serwotke|Thomas Bartholomäus
title: Valerie
